get.description: List of information about builds that match the current query

parameters.name: feature_version
parameters.description:
Feature release version you wish to download. Feature versions are whole numbers e.g. 8,11,16,17,18.

Available Feature versions can be obtained from https://api.adoptium.net/v3/info/available_releases

parameters.name: release_type
parameters.description: Type of release. Either a release version, known as General Availability(ga) or an Early Access(ea)

parameters.name: before
parameters.description:
Return binaries whose updated_at is before the given date/time. When a date is given the match is inclusive of the given day.

  • 2020-01-21
  • 2020-01-21T10:15:30
  • 20200121
  • 2020-12-21T10:15:30Z
  • 2020-12-21+01:00

parameters.name: c_lib
parameters.description: C Lib type, typically would imply image_type has been set to staticlibs

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Vendor of the binary. This is the organisation that produced the binary package.

200.description: Release with the given vendor and name

get.summary: Returns release information about the specified version.
get.description: List of information about builds that match the current query

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:
Java version range (maven style) of versions to include.

e.g:
* `11.0.4.1+11.1`
* `[1.0,2.0)`
* `(,1.0]`

Details of maven version ranges can be found at
    <https://maven.apache.org/enforcer/enforcer-rules/versionRanges.html>

parameters.name: c_lib
parameters.description: C Lib type, typically would imply image_type has been set to staticlibs

parameters.description: Type of release. Either a release version, known as General Availability(ga) or an Early Access(ea)

parameters.name: semver
parameters.description: Indicates that any version arguments provided in this request were Adoptium semantic versions

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Vendor of the binary. This is the organisation that produced the binary package.

Name of the release as displayed in github or https://adoptopenjdk.net/ e.g jdk-11.0.4+11, jdk8u172-b00-201807161800.

A list of release names can be obtained from https://api.adoptium.net/v3/info/release_names

get.description: Parses a java version string and returns that data in a structured format

DateTime.description:
Date/time. When only a date is given the time is set to the end of the given day.

  • 2020-01-21
  • 2020-01-21T10:15:30
  • 20200121
  • 2020-12-21T10:15:30Z
  • 2020-12-21+01:00

available_releases.description: The versions for which adopt have produced a ga release

available_lts_releases.description: The LTS versions for which adopt have produced a ga release

most_recent_lts.description: The highest LTS version for which adopt have produced a ga release

most_recent_feature_release.description: The highest version (LTS or not) for which adopt have produced a ga release

most_recent_feature_version.description: The highest version (LTS or not) for which we have produced a build, this may be a version that has not yet produced a ga release

tip_version.description: The version that is currently in development at openjdk

SortMethod.description: DEFAULT sort order is by: version, then date, then name, then id. DATE sorts by date, then version, then name, then id.
